alert.note: Alert for Copiah; Hinds; Leake; Madison; Rankin; Scott; Simpson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 30 at 4:57PM CDT until March 30 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Leake County in central Mississippi... Rankin County in central Mississippi... Northwestern Simpson County in central Mississippi... Western Scott County in central Mississippi... Southeastern Hinds County in central Mississippi... Northeastern Copiah County in central Mississippi... Southeastern Madison County in central Mississippi... * Until 545 PM CDT. * At 456 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Canton to near Gallman, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Goshen Springs around 505 PM CDT. Pisgah around 510 PM CDT. Harrisville around 525 PM CDT. Ludlow around 530 PM CDT. Mendenhall and Tuscola around 545 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Lena, D`Lo, Braxton and Puckett. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for central Mississippi. A Tornado Watch remains in effect for the warned area. Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. Although a tornado is not immediately likely, if one is spotted, act quickly and move to a place of safety inside a sturdy structure such as a basement or small interior room.

area.areaDesc: Copiah; Hinds; Leake; Madison; Rankin; Scott; Simpson
